snippet: On Site Opera performed Rameau’s “Pygmalion” at Madame Tussauds, enrolling the likenesses of Julia Roberts and Kim Kardashian in the tale of the sculptor who falls in love with his creation.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by On Site Opera of Jean-Philippe Rameau opera Pygmalion at Madame Tussauds.
lead_paragraph: On Site Opera performed Rameau’s “Pygmalion” at Madame Tussauds, enrolling the likenesses of Julia Roberts and Kim Kardashian in the tale of the sculptor who falls in love with his creation.

headline.seo: On Site Opera Brings ‘Pygmalion’ to Madame Tussauds
headline.main: Cupid Flitted About Briskly, While the TV Stars Just Stood There
headline.print_headline: Cupid Flitted About Briskly, While the TV Stars Just Stood There
